snippet.title: Climate & Seasons I Feature Highlights Ep 8 I Cities: Skylines II
snippet.description:
☀️ Some days are for sunshine & rainbows.🌈 Some days are for, well, rain! 🌧️

Introducing Climates in Cities: Skylines II that brings changing seasons with maps inspired by real-world locations. 

In this episode of Feature Highlights, learn how Climate controls weather, seasons & how to prepare your city for a natural disaster.

Footage captured In-Game is not final and might change in time for release.

Pre-Order Cities: Skylines II NOW!
https://www.paradoxinteractive.com/games/cities-skylines-ii/about

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Be sure to subscribe for more Cities: Skylines content! https://pdxint.at/Subscribe
